en.name: Pichsereyvathanak Khy
en.quote: Transforming raw data into actionable insights through machine learning and analytics.

about.intro: I'm a passionate data science student focused on building machine learning models and data analysis solutions. With expertise in Python, statistics, and data visualization, I transform complex datasets into meaningful insights.
about.bio: Currently pursuing my degree in Computer Science with specialized on Data Science at Cambodia Academy of Digital Technology (CADT). I have hands-on experience with real-world datasets and a strong foundation in mathematics and programming. My goal is to leverage data-driven approaches to solve impactful problems in the tech industry.

education.institution: Cambodia Academy of Digital Technology - CADT
description: Program Lead — Next Gen Engagement Program (Batch II)
Volunteer: Code-C 2025, ACET 2025, AI4Education at CADT

experience.company: LHY Sing Yong CO., LTD. | Part-time
description: Entered monthly expense and invoice data into Excel to support tax declaration for client companies
Ensured accuracy and consistency of financial data entries

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction Using RapidMiner
projects.description: Built a machine learning model using Random Forest and Gradient Boosting to predict customer churn with 87% accuracy. Implemented feature engineering and model optimization techniques.
projects.problemStatement: A telecommunications company was losing 20% of their customers annually but didn't know which customers were at risk. They needed a predictive model to identify high-risk customers before they leave.
projects.detailedDescription: I developed an end-to-end machine learning pipeline that processes historical customer data including usage patterns, billing information, and demographics. The model uses ensemble methods combining Random Forest and Gradient Boosting algorithms to achieve 87% accuracy. Feature engineering involved creating interaction features and temporal indicators. The solution enabled the company to implement targeted retention strategies.

projects.title: KonnYoeung - Capstone Project
projects.description: Developed a regression model using neural networks to predict house prices. Created an interactive web dashboard for visualization using Streamlit.
projects.problemStatement: Real estate agents struggled to provide accurate price estimates for properties, leading to mispriced listings and extended time-on-market. An automated valuation system was needed.
projects.detailedDescription: I constructed a deep learning regression model using TensorFlow/Keras with multiple hidden layers and dropout regularization to prevent overfitting. The model analyzes property features including location, square footage, age, and amenities. Implemented an interactive Streamlit dashboard allowing agents to input property details and receive instant price predictions with confidence intervals.

leadership.title: Program lead - Next-Gen Engagement Program - Batch II
leadership.description: Next-Gen Engagement Program - Batch II, a 5-week program during the school break supported by the Computer Science Department at CADT
detailedDescription: Oversaw end-to-end program planning and execution, from initial concept development to final implementation
Managed and coordinated all organizer tasks and workflows, ensuring smooth weekly operations
Prepared and submitted weekly progress reports to the Computer Science Department
Led the successful delivery of the program and its closing event, Next-Gen's Day, showcasing student projects
Coordinated participation of 250+ attendees, including Year 1–Year 4 students and CS department lecturers
Initiated early planning starting in May, handling logistics, schedules, and team coordination
Worked closely with a 15-member organizing team, taking on multiple roles including MC, instructor, negotiator, digital marketer, designer, content creator, and event promoter
Ensured high program quality and student engagement through continuous improvement and collaboration
leadership.impact: Successfully host the 6 week program of learning and projects teamwork, also the Next-Gen's Day with over 250 participants. We're set a great example (or landmark) and built a strong foundation for the next generation (Batch III) to follow and make it even better.

leadership.title: Session Coodinator - DGF 2025
leadership.description: Digital Government Forum (DGF) 2025, held under the theme “Accelerating Digital Future: Governance, Growth, and Global Partnerships.”
detailedDescription: I supported the speakers and moderator for Session 15: “Connecting Digital Innovation Ecosystems - From Digital Parks and Investment to Regional Startup Growth.”

Over the three days, I witnessed Cambodia's digital momentum - from engaging discussions and tech showcases to the exciting announcement of Cambodia's 5G launch in early 2026, opening new opportunities for innovation and connectivity.

leadership.title: Flow Team - Ai4Education 2025
leadership.description: Ai4Education 2025, a national competition and conference focused on AI in education, bringing together students, lecturers, researchers, and industry-related participants
detailedDescription: Supported event flow operations over 3 days to ensure smooth coordination and execution
Assisted on Day 1 (Student Competition Day), where students showcased projects developed during the program
Supported Days 2-3 (Conference Days), including panel discussions, workshops, booth showcases, and networking activities
Collaborated with CCTimes and Bong Kry Lita to provide accurate event information and images for media coverage
Reviewed and verified article content and image usage to ensure relevance, accuracy, and alignment with the event context
Contributed to maintaining a professional public image of the event through careful coordination with media partners

leadership.title: Volunteer - ACET 2025
leadership.description: ACET is the ASEAN conference that focuses on the latest research and Development in digital technology but more specifically on Natural Language Processing (NLP), Data Science, Networking & IoT, Artificial Intelligence (AI). ACET conference aims to connect researchers' knowledge and Building applications for smarter societies.
detailedDescription: tbc

leadership.title: Flow Team - Code C 2025
leadership.description: CODE-C 2025, a developer conference focused on AI applications and emerging technologies for real-world impact
detailedDescription: Supported event operations during 10-11 October 2025, organized by CADT
Provided clear guidance to participants on session topics, schedules, allocated time slots, and room locations
Coordinated session flow to ensure on-time transitions between talks and activities
Assisted speakers in the Co-Working Room, supporting logistics and session preparation
Worked closely with 8 speakers across two days, covering topics ranging from business and healthcare to inclusive design for Cambodia
Contributed to a smooth and professional conference experience for both speakers and attendees

leadership.title: School Facilitator - University & TVET Fair 2024
leadership.description: University & TVET Fair 2024, an education and career fair focused on high school students exploring university options and university students seeking job opportunities.
detailedDescription: Began first volunteer experience with Sala.co Events, gaining hands-on exposure to large-scale event coordination
Served as a School Facilitator, coordinating with high school students and teachers throughout the event
Managed student attendance and headcounts, ensuring accurate numbers and smooth group movement
Supported student engagement by guiding participants and helping them enjoy the event experience
Participated in self-development workshops provided by organizers, covering communication skills, event operations, and stakeholder coordination
Collaborated with a diverse group of students, teachers, and professionals, strengthening interpersonal and teamwork skills

km.name: ឃី ពេជ្រសេរីវឌ្ឍនៈ
km.role: និស្សិតផ្នែកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រទិន្នន័យ
km.quote: Transforming raw data into actionable insights through machine learning and analytics.
km.location: រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ, ប្រទេសកម្ពុជា
